_inputs.name: pollInterval
_inputs.label: Poll Interval (ms)
_inputs.description: Time between variable polling when no change value notification is available. Only used in events. (milliseconds)

_inputs.name: byteOrder
_inputs.label: Byte Order
_inputs.description: Byte order of the data of the message

_inputs.name: convertNonPrintableASCIICharsOnSend
_inputs.label: Convert Non Printable ASCII Chars on Send:
_inputs.description: Does character substitution on values sent. Replaces ASCII name tokens with the correspondent ASCII value.(e.g.: <NUL> to #00, ..., <DEL> to #07, on set values).

_inputs.name: convertNonPrintableASCIICharsOnReceive
_inputs.label: Convert Non Printable ASCII Chars on Receive:
_inputs.description: Does character substitution on values received. Replaces non printable ascii codes to correspondent <NAME>.(e.g.: #00 to <NUL>, #01 to <SOH>,...,#7F to <DEL>)

_inputs.name: address
_inputs.label: Address
_inputs.description: Address (Ip) to listen to. Leave empty for all network addresses (0.0.0.0)

_inputs.name: port
_inputs.label: Port
_inputs.description: Port number the server will be listening. Defaults to 80

_inputs.name: protocol
_inputs.label: Protocol
_inputs.description: The protocol used for exchanging data

_inputs.name: certificateAuthority
_inputs.label: Certificate Authority
_inputs.description: Certificate Authority - can be either a path to a file or the contents of the file in plain text. Format should be 'pem'. The certificateAuthority property is used to define a set of trusted Certificate Authority (CA) certificates that an application or system uses to verify the authenticity of SSL/TLS certificates presented by servers during secure communication. It serves as a trust anchor, allowing the application to establish the legitimacy of certificates in the trust chain presented by the server.

_inputs.name: certificate
_inputs.label: Certificate
_inputs.description: Own server certificate - can be either a path to a file or the contents of the file in plain text. Format should be 'pem'.

_inputs.name: key
_inputs.label: key
_inputs.description: Own server private key - can be either a path to a file or the contents of the file in plain text. Format should be 'pem'.

tasks.caption: Send Post Telemetry Numeric data to Data Platform

tasks.name: postNumericTelemetry_5618
tasks.caption: Send Post Telemetry Numeric data to Data Platform

tasks.name: postMultipleNumericTelemetry_9d13
tasks.caption: Send Post Multiple Telemetry Numeric data to Data Platform
